summary: After the Civil War, a highly decorated Shoshone Indian veteran plans to raise cattle in Wyoming but white farmers plan to grab fertile tribal lands by pitting the whites against the Indians.
cast: Robert Taylor|Louis Calhern|Paula Raymond|Marshall Thompson|James Mitchell|Edgar Buchanan|Rhys Williams|Spring Byington|James Millican|Bruce Cowling|Fritz Leiber|Harry Antrim|Chief John Big Tree|William Bailey|Vivian Brown|Roy Butler|Bertha Cody|Cecil Combs|Frank Conlan|Harold A. Deane|Tom Fadden|Dan Foster|Dabbs Greer|Herman Hack|Al Haskell|Whitey Hughes|Jack Kenny|Henry Marco|Frank Matts|John Maxwell|Kermit Maynard|Merrill McCormick|Philo McCullough|Frank McGrath|Buddy Messinger|Lee Phelps|William 'Bill' Phillips|Buddy Roosevelt|Phil Schumacher|George Sky Eagle|Cecil Smith|Titus Spencer
title: La puerta del diablo
